# Installation

This guide explains how to install Test Project.

## Prerequisites

- Node.js 18 or higher
- npm or pnpm

## Install via npm

```bash
npm install test-project
```

## Install via pnpm

```bash
pnpm add test-project
```

## Verify Installation

```bash
npm list test-project
```
